abstract: That era when Pfizer was the king of the hill wasn’t some distant age — it was just maybe three or four years ago. Oh, how the mighty have fallen!
snippet: That era when Pfizer was the king of the hill wasn’t some distant age — it was just maybe three or four years ago. Oh, how the mighty have fallen!
lead_paragraph: There was once a pharmaceutical company that could do no wrong. It had the best-selling drug in the world. It saturated the airwaves with its ads, and swarmed doctors’ offices with its army of good-looking sales representatives. It had mastered the art of turning drugs into blockbusters. It made many billions in profits. Wall Street analysts loved it.

headline.main: The Dangers of Swinging for the Fences
headline.print_headline: The Dangers Of Swinging For the Fences
